org.jamwiki.servlets

Class ItemsServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.context.support.ApplicationObjectSupport
      • org.springframework.web.context.support.WebApplicationObjectSupport
        • org.springframework.web.servlet.support.WebContentGenerator
          • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.AbstractController
            • org.jamwiki.servlets.JAMWikiServlet
              • org.jamwiki.servlets.ItemsServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller

    public class ItemsServlet
extends JAMWikiServlet
    Used to build Special: pages that display lists of topics on the Wiki, such as when displaying lists of all existing images or topics.

    • Method Detail

      • handleJAMWikiRequest

        public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView handleJAMWikiRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                                         org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView next,
                                                                         WikiPageInfo pageInfo)
                                                                  throws Exception
        This method handles the request after its parent class receives control. It gets the topic's name and the virtual wiki name from the uri, loads the topic and returns a view to the end user.
        Parameters:
        request - - Standard HttpServletRequest object.
        response - - Standard HttpServletResponse object.
        Returns:
        A ModelAndView object to be handled by the rest of the Spring framework.
        Throws:
        Exception
